title: definevalue
author: definevalue
created_time: July 08, 2022, 08:24:42 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 04:31:48 AM by definevalue
content: 5950 AMD chip 3090TI 128GB ram will include brand new 1TB NVME Samsung drive no OS included. Paid $6000 when I assembled this taking offers in BTC2012 clamshell macbook no SSD/HDD replaced Battery and then the power brick went bad. Will take reasonable offers sold as is and 4 parts.I3 Macmini was going to make it a local server but never got to it. I have 1 extra 3090TI with the NVlink if your looking for some serious hashing or want to get into mining. I also have apple care to do on a M1 MAX 16 inch macbook pro meaning you'll get a brand new refurbished oneTaking offers on both within reason. Crypto or PayPal.
